item.description: "Where? Omni Shoreham Hotel 2500 Calvert Street, NW Washington, DC 20008 Phone: 202.234.0700 When? Thursday, April 23, 2015 – 8:00 am – 5:00 pm Friday, April 24, 2015 – 8:00 am – 2:00 pm What? Ex-Im Bank’s Annual Conference presents a unique opportunity for companies from around the world to meet U.S. exporters. Attendees include more than 1,100 exporters and representatives of financial institutions, foreign trade partners, and government officials. At the event, participants also meet Ex-Im Bank staff and obtain detailed information about our export credit products and programs. Registration: Registration will open on Monday, November 17, 2014. We will send you an email notification once registration is open and provide the registration link and more details. Exhibitor Information: If your organization is interested in participating as an exhibitor, please send an email inquiry to Capital Meeting Planning via email: exhibits@cmpinc.net. Hotel Accommodations: Overnight accommodations are being offered by the Omni Shoreham Hotel at a conference rate of $279.00/night + tax. A link for on-line reservations will be provided once conference registration is open. For More Information: Please contact Capital Meeting Planning via email: Registrar@cmpinc.net or by phone: 703.536.4992."

item.event_name: Global Access for Small Business Forum
item.description: "EXPORTER FORUM Tuesday, October 21, 2014 8:30 a.m. to NOON Minneapolis Central Library Pohlad Room 300 Nicollet Mall Minneapolis, MN 55401 Learn How to Increase Your Company's International Sales Find new markets and customers Protect against the risk of nonpayment Extend credit to your buyers Access vital working capital Congressman Keith Ellison (MN-5) and Patricia M. Loui, Member, Board of Directors Export-Import Bank of the United States Invite You to Attend an Exporter Forum"

item.event_name: Trade Finance Solutions for Exporters and Lenders
item.description: "Tuesday, December 9th, 2014 – Trade Finance Solutions for Exporters and Lenders 8:30 AM Welcome & Introductions 8:45 AM Overview/Executive Summary (New at Ex-Im) 9:00 AM Working Capital Guarantee – Overview 9:45 AM Global Credit Express 10:30 AM BREAK 10:45 AM Overview of General Bank Public Policies 11:15 AM Short-term Credit Insurance 12:00 PM LUNCH 1:00 PM Structured Trade and Project Finance 1:30 PM Short-Term Financial Institution Policies / Medium/Long Term Financing, \"Buyer Finance\" 2:30 PM Operations3:15 PM BREAK 3:30 PM Legal 3:50 PM Wrap Up 4:00 PM Adjourn"

item.event_name: Virginia and DC District Export Council Energy and Environmental Technologies Trade Mission to the Canary Islands and Africagua
Using Technology to Drive Performance in International Credit Management
item.description: "Amongst the discussion points will be: What generic systems are available? How do you evaluate the product/system? What are the effects on the company’s existing credit policy? What are the challenges faced such as integration with other systems like ERP, CRM Finance, etc.? How successful are bolt-on products? Bespoke or standard software solutions? Adherence to audit and compliance procedures—what are the obstacles? How do you manage the process through to implementation? Above is a short-list of the many factors that can arise when embarking on this process. This Roundtable series will provide a global generic template of helpful hints and tips on managing such a project."

item.event_name: DISCOVER GLOBAL MARKETS: Healthcare and Life Sciences

item.description: "Join FCIB in Baltimore this October for a premier networking opportunity with your peers from around the world and educational sessions led by industry experts. Dig deep into the most pressing issues facing international credit professionals today, and learn new techniques and best practices that will be valuable to both you and your company. The Global Conference is truly a can't-miss professional development opportunity!"
